DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to detect differences in function between rehabilitated hip arthroplasty patients with customized prosthesis v. commercial prosthesis and to reveal if there exist differences in strength and cardiovascular capacity between hip arthroplasty patients and healthy controls.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment and Rehabilitation of Patients With Hip Arthroplasty to Regain Walk and Work Efficiency and Quality of Life
DOC.criteria: Undergone hip surgery 35 years ago Age < 70 years Heart or lung diseases Malign diseases No muscle/skeletal diseases that compromises testing
